Room.Name: Caledonia Road/Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Caledonia Road and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street is a commercial district where you might find just about anything for sale. Looking for armor or perhaps a good horse? Or perhaps you would like to buy an enchanted staff? all of its available somehwere along Main Street. There is a bazaar that takes place during the summer months that attracts visitors even from the sophisticated cities of Kista and Oceancrest.
